Name: Aurelio
description:
Aurelio is 52 years old, married, and lives with his spouse and children.

He wants the loan to purchase supplies, seedlings, and soil amendments for the new planting of his bean crop.

He hopes that this investment will offer his family a better quality of life and greater financial stability, and to be able to continue growing as a person and a micro-entrepreneur.

This is the second loan he has gotten from FUDECOSUR. He has not previously has other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him the loan with greater terms and a much lower interest rate.
